metas.name: description
metas.content: Coding Blocks offers online Web App Development Courses with NodeJS. Learn web development online and build great websites. Best online web development course.

openGraph.title: Competitive Programming Online
openGraph.description: Hone your CP skills by attending 1-week Competitive Programming Course. Learn new concepts by solving over 150 complex problems of varying difficulty level and brighten up you chances of getting selected in APAC and ACM-ICPC.
